title: Star Trek: Discovery (season 1)
summary: The first season of the American television series Star Trek: Discovery is set a decade before the events of Star Trek: The Original Series and follows the crew of the USS Discovery during the Federationâ€“Klingon war. The season was produced by CBS Television Studios in association with Secret Hideout, Roddenberry Entertainment, and Living Dead Guy Productions, with Gretchen J. Berg and Aaron Harberts serving as showrunners, and Akiva Goldsman providing producing support.
